member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.TransientFaultHandling.DocumentClientExtensions
member.summary: Extensions to enable reliability features for Azure DocumentDB client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.TransientFaultHandling.DocumentClientExtensions.AsReliable(Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.DocumentClient,Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy)
member.summary: Wraps provided client instance with retry logic to improve resilience for transient failures.
member.param: Raw DocumentDB client.
Retry strategy to apply on request failures. Provided retry strategy will be wrapped into to speed up retries whenever server sends retry-after-ms header back to the client.
member.returns: Reliable DocumentDB client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.TransientFaultHandling.DocumentClientExtensions.AsReliable(Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.DocumentClient,Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy,Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy)
member.summary: Wraps provided client instance with retry logic to improve resilience for transient failures. When this overload is used, retry-after-ms header will not be honored, unless is used.
member.param: Raw DocumentDB client.
Retry policy to execute retries on read (idempotent) request failures.
Retry policy to execute retries on write request failures.
member.returns: Reliable DocumentDB client.

member.summary: Opens the connection to validate that the client initialization is successful.

member.remarks: This method is recommended to be called, after the constructor, but before calling any other methods on the client instance.
